meanings.definition: A contagious skin infection caused by various types of fungi.
meanings.sent1: My cat had ringworms, so I had to be careful not to touch the affected areas.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an antifungal cream to treat the ringworms on my arm.
meanings.sent3: When the ringworms heard about the antifungal cream, they packed their bags and left in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: The spread of rumors in the office was like a ringworm infestation, infecting everyone with anxiety.
meanings.sent5: The ringworms on the tree bark looked like tiny, moving dots of mold.

meanings.definition: A small worm-like parasite that infects the skin or hair of animals.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian treated the dog's ringworms with a special shampoo.
meanings.sent2: Ringworms can cause itching and hair loss in pets if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent3: The ringworms in the petting zoo were quite the fashionistas, sporting tiny hair bows.
meanings.sent4: The ringworms in the soil wriggled like secrets waiting to be unearthed.
meanings.sent5: The ringworms in the fur of the rabbit looked like tiny threads of mischief.
